entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnableRequestDelegateGenerator by default for PublishTrimmed apps #48416
  • ComponentState isn't always disposed #48411
  • Blazor WebAssembly integration with Msal.js fails fatally when changing Authority URL #48404
  • Filter Outgoing Invocations in SignalR #48401

Closed

  • Default EventSourceSupport to true in ASP.NET Native AOT apps #48247
    8.0-preview5
  • Exception calling Dispose on IJSInProcessObjectReference instance in Blazor WebAssembly #48280
    8.0-preview6
  • We have a project template where we can add support for Server and Webassembly #46395
    8.0-preview5
  • Memory leak in Health Checks #48240
  • Application using Request Delegate Generator fails to start with KeyNotFoundException #48379
  • Request Delegate Generator code counts as user code for code coverage #48376

PullRequests

Created

  • [7.0] Allow overriding the host header if doesn't match the absolute-form host #48415
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #48414
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Initial support for [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48412
    area-blazor
  • Use Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics #48403
    area-runtime
  • feat: add StringSyntaxAttribute for guid args #48402
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/8.0-preview5] Ensure ComponentState is always disposed #48410
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • [Infrastructure] Add test retries for InjectedStartup_DefaultApplicationNameIsEntryAssembly #48409
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Transitive package to provide coherency in dotnet/extensions #48398
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Update JSInProcessObjectReference.cs #48287
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview6
  • Use `Type.IsByRefLike`. #48351
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview6
  • Ensure ComponentState is always disposed #48406
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Disable debugger support in trimming tests #48399
    needs-area-label, area-hosting, 8.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] Update template localization file #48405
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview6
  • Add [GeneratedCode] for more RDG output #48377
    area-runtime, community-contribution, feature-rdg, 8.0-preview6
  • Update branding to preview6 #48397
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6

Updated

  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #48338
    area-signalr
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching
  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Source generator to create the discovery information at compile time. #48284
    area-blazor
  • use new System.Text.Ascii APIs, remove internal helpers #48368
    area-runtime
  • WithOpenApi generates annotations for endpoints without MethodInfo #47346
    area-web-frameworks
  • [WIP] Support metadata only endpoints #46536
    area-web-frameworks
  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735
    area-runtime
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    area-runtime
  • Skip template update check in template tests #44532
    area-mvc
  • adds kiota to dotnet openapi tool #41928
    area-web-frameworks
  • Revert "Skip failing template tests" #41950
    area-mvc
  • http.sys; add opt-in support for kernel-mode response buffering #47776
    area-runtime, servers-httpsys, area-perf, pending-ci-rerun
  • [blazor] Set Cross-Origin-Policy headers for multi-threaded runtime #47855
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview4
  • Testing updated install scripts #47951
    area-infrastructure, area-commandlinetools, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun
  • for CI purposes: try on-by-default #47958
    area-runtime
  • Add MediaTypeHeaderValue parsing overloads accepting IList of StringSegment #48035
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Code Fix for AfterOnResourceExecution Diagnostic Event. #48077
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Uses Fallback When Without Repository #48103
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly #48154
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript, pending-ci-rerun
  • Change API template to only use Invariant Globalization in Native AOT… #48238
    area-mvc
  • Update SDK #48252
    area-infrastructure
  • DOM merging #48258
    area-blazor
  • Pass through arbitrary attributes to QuickGrid #48268
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • explicitly identifying button type in QuickGrid columnbase #48277
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Bump selenium-standalone to 8.3.0 - allow E2E testing on osx-arm64 #48288
    area-infrastructure
  • Issue #45096 Toru_Watanbe #48352
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Don't run publish-specific Mvc.Testing tasks if project is not publishable #48364
    area-mvc, feature-mvc-testing, 6.0.x
  • Migrate RDF-specific tests to shared infrastructure (part 2) #48369
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Rename ASP.NET Core metrics #48375
    blocked, area-runtime, area-signalr
  • Update project resolution and app settings writes in `dotnet user-jwts` #48385
    area-commandlinetools, feature-userjwts
  • DO NOT REVIEW Add a trimming test that always fails for experimental purposes #48386
    area-hosting
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2187531 #48387
    area-mvc
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
